author: indika
msg: Throttle mediator can configure using policy

author: olegk
msg: If a read operation returns -1, the channel is very likely to be in an inconsistent state. Mark the session as closed and return false to isAppInputReady()

author: chathura_ce
msg: Fixed - Addressing should only be removed from the cloned message context. Original message context used to send should not be altered as it is required if we want resend after a failure.
